description: They have very nice Contributor Program and, also for this Hacktoberfest, they are giving away hats and hoodies for different levels of contributions.

Modtoberfest is an annual celebration of open source projects in the Minecraft Community! those with at least 4 PRs will be rewarded with a prize pack that includes awesome stickers and they will also be planting a tree.
Every contribution registered in the form will receive a prize, the more contributions you make, and the more significant the contribution, the greater the prize.
Will be providing Wren AI Exclusive Swag Pack! (T-shirts & Hat!) as a sign of appreciation to the contributors.

All contributors with accepted PRs will receive a cool Holopin! ü§©

‚óè 2 or more Accepted Pull Requests: Crawlee Exclusive Hoodie.

Can you code? If provide you a design, then it's time to take part in Design2code2live by Arvind Kumar Vemula. This year he's giving away sticker packs for all the developers who contributes to design2code2live

Implement SDK features, improving UI/UX, adding support for new APIs, enhancing security, and creating example notebooks.
üéÅ Contributors with >= 2 accepted PRs will receive a pack of our new Langfuse stickers and get a chance to win a Langfuse t-shirt.
Formbricks is taking part in oss.gg hackathon 2024 üïπÔ∏è and they have some really nice side quests and challenges waiting for you to win the prizes.
A simple self-hostable save-it-later tool that integrates with getpocket.com the web and terminal written in Rust.
Contributors will receive a Chimoney reward of $10 and Digital Badge. Contributors with up to 4 PRs will recieve t-shirts (limited  stock)

Shuru is a basic command / task runner written in Rust, so if you're beginner in Rust and want to contribute to open source, this is the right place for you. Also get 5 cool Rust Stickers üé¥
50 Swag Kit available that will be given out on a first come, first served basis to contributors.
In hacktoberfest contribute to CopilotKit and Win Exclusive Swag!
Top 10 will win TBD x Hacktoberfest 2024 swag! The top 3 contributors from top 10 will be awarded very limited customized TBD x Hacktoberfest 2024 swag with their github username on it.

Contributors to our projects will get a chance to win:
- 3 Contributions: Amazon Vouchers (upto $10) + LambdaTest Licences (90 days)
- 5 Contributions or More: Amazon Vouchers (upto $20) + LambdaTest Licences (90 days).
Participants with four accepted pull/merge requests between October 1 and October 31 will receive a swag pack from Composio.

Every contributor whose PR is merged will receive GPU credits to use with dstack Sky for AI development!
also Bounties: Minor issue: $15, Major issue: $100, Advanced issue: $500
The contributors who make the most significant contributions to Ballerina during Hacktoberfest will be rewarded with the prizes.
Earn points and get exclusive Tolgee swag, including stickers, socks, and T-shirts
Offering a $50 reward to one lucky contributor based on a raffle system.
Get Community Badge, ServiceNow Merch, Bragging rights. check the link for more info.
Collect credits by completing GitHub issues and redeem them for prizes! For every 100 credits earned, you will receive one entry into the drawing to win one of three high end Razer‚Ñ¢ Blade laptops.
Get one PR merged to earn exclusive Hyperswitch swag. Get 3 or more PRs merged to receive a special swag kit from Hyperswitch.
GitLab Heroes Program
Participate in Hacktoberfest and contribute to any of the projects in the Identity and Security space shortlisted by Auth0. The first 100 valid* submissions will get the T-shirt.
Join Instill AI on the occasion of Hacktoberfest 2024, They're thrilled to offer rewards, including Amazon gift cards and newly updated Instill Swag packages.

Turbot empowers Cloud and DevOps teams to conquer cloud complexity, Turbot is adding their own swag for contributions to their projects. They will offer unique Turbot stickers and t-shirts for no-code, low-code and high-code contributions.
